name: WoW-Raid-Manager
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: WoW Raid Manager or WRM for short is a PHP based application supporting World of Warcraft guilds.

matches.ghdb: "Raid Management Provided by WoW Raid Manager"

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Raid Management Provided by <a href="http:\/\/www.wowraidmanager.net\/">WoW Raid Manager<\/a> v([\d\.]+))
